title:
NG5000: Hydration was enabled with unsupported Zone.js instance.

對不支援的 Zone.js 例項啟用了水合。
contents:
mode_edit

NG5000: Hydration was enabled with unsupported Zone.js instance. 對不支援的 Zone.js 例項啟用了水合。link

說明link

Descriptionlink

此警告意味著啟用了水合的應用程式使用的是未受支援的 Zone.js 版本，比如自訂版本或“noop”版本（請參閱此處的更多資訊）。

This warning means that the hydration was enabled for an application that was configured to use an unsupported version of Zone.js: either a custom or a "noop" one (see more info here).

當 Zone.js 在應用程式中變得穩定時，水合依賴於來自 Zone.js 的訊號，以便讓 Angular 可以在伺服器上啟動序列化過程或在客戶端啟動水合後清理（以刪除殘留的 DOM 節點）。

Hydration relies on a signal from Zone.js when it becomes stable inside an application, so that Angular can start the serialization process on the server or post-hydration cleanup on the client (to remove DOM nodes that remained unclaimed).

提供 Zone.js 的自訂或 “noop” 實現可能會讓“穩定”事件出現不同的時序，從而過早或過晚觸發序列化或清理工作。這還不是一個完全支援的配置。

Providing a custom or a "noop" Zone.js implementation may lead to a different timing of the "stable" event, thus triggering the serialization or the cleanup too early or too late. This is not yet a fully supported configuration.

如果你使用自訂 Zone.js 實現，請確保在正確的時間點發出“onStable”事件，並且不會讓應用程式導致錯誤的水合行為。

If you use a custom Zone.js implementation, make sure that the "onStable" event is emitted at the right time and does not result in incorrect application behavior with hydration.

有關水合的更多資訊，請參閱水合指南。

More information about hydration can be found in the hydration guide.
